title: Travis Scott Tragedy Puts Live Nation’s Music-Festival Bet to the Test
sub_head: Outdoor events have helped lead a live-music rebound this year; the concert promoter has been named in several lawsuits
body:
Live Nation Entertainment Inc. relied heavily on outdoor events to build back its business this year. The incident at a Travis Scott festival over the weekend is providing a test of that strategy.
Live Nation is the world’s largest concert promotion company and is the owner of the Astroworld festival’s promoter. On Monday, its shares fell 5.4% in the first day of trading after the festival was cut short due to a crowd surge, eight deaths and multiple injuries.
